host.title: Database connection host
host.description: IP address or DNS of the database server.

protocol.title: Database driver identifier
protocol.description: Type of your relational database (RDBMS). PostgreSQL, MySQL, SQL Server, MariaDB, ...

database.title: The database used to run query
database.description: The database used to run query to search for users.

usersTable.title: The table used to run query
usersTable.description: The table used to run query to search for users.

selectUserByUsernameQuery.title: Query to find for a user using its identifier (username)
selectUserByUsernameQuery.description: The query which is executed to search for an user using its identifier (username).

selectUserByMultipleFieldsQuery.title: Query to find for a user using multiple fields (username or email)
selectUserByMultipleFieldsQuery.description: The query which is executed to search for an user using its identifier (username) or another field (email). If this field isn't specified, the findUserByUsernameQuery is used

selectUserByEmailQuery.title: Query to find for a user using its email (email)
selectUserByEmailQuery.description: The query which is executed to search for an user using its email (email).

passwordEncoder.title: Password encoder
passwordEncoder.description: The encoding mechanism used to store user password value.

passwordEncoding.title: Password binary-to-text encoding
passwordEncoding.description: This property will cause the encoded pass to be returned as encoding text representation

useDedicatedSalt.title: Separate salt from the password value ?

passwordSaltAttribute.title: User password salt attribute
passwordSaltAttribute.description: Password salt field of your users if any (make sure the column exists in your datatable)

passwordSaltLength.title: User password salt length in bytes

option.title: Option
option.description: Connection option name (https://r2dbc.io/ for more information)

value.title: Value
value.description: Connection option value (https://r2dbc.io/ for more information)
